sentences: Myra Granberg (born 7 August 1994) is a Swedish singer-songwriter and producer.
In 2019, she signed with Sony Music.
On 14 February, 2020, Granberg released the single "Äru min nu" and it peaked at number four on the Swedish Heatseekers Chart.
On 15 May 2020, she released the single "Salt i såren", featuring Malin Christin.
On 16 April 2021, Granberg released "Lose My Mind", the first track from her upcoming debut studio album, which is scheduled for release on 10 September 2021.
